title.en: Aspiration Written in Sadness During the Water Snake Year

text.en: To the gurus, buddhas, bodhisattvas, peaceful and wrathful yidam deities, vīras, ḍākinīs, dharma protectors, wealth deities and treasure keepers, I pay homage, make offerings and go for refuge:
text.en-trans: lama dang sangye changchub sempa yidam zhitro pawo khandro chökyong norlha terdak gi tsok dang chepa nam la chaktsal zhing chö do kyab su chi’o

text.en: Inspire me with your blessings, I pray.
text.en-trans: jingyi lob par dzé du sol

text.en: In all my lives throughout beginningless saṃsāra until now I have committed harmful, non-virtuous actions, both proscribed and naturally harmful wrongs,
text.en-trans: dak gi tsé khorwa tokma mepa né tama danta la tuk gi bar dikpa migewé lé ché dang rangzhin gyi nyepa dang

text.en: I have committed downfalls,
text.en-trans: tungwar gyur ching

text.en: And done things that obstruct and obscure the path to liberation and omniscience;
text.en-trans: tarpa dang tamché khyenpé lam la bardu chö ching dribpar gyurwé tsok rang gi jepa dang

text.en: I have encouraged others to do likewise,
text.en-trans: zhen la jé du chukpa dang

text.en: And rejoiced in their actions. Thus, all that I have done both directly and indirectly related to body, speech and mind, I hereby confess before all the gurus, buddhas and their heirs.
text.en-trans: jepa la jesu yi rangwar jepa sok ngö dang gyü né go sum dang drelwa chi chipa tamché lama gyalwa sé dang chepa nam kyi chen ngar tol zhing shak so

text.en: I feel sorrow and remorse.
text.en-trans: nong zhing gyö do

text.en: I do not conceal anything,
text.en-trans: mi chab bo

text.en: No do I hide anything.
text.en-trans: mi bé do

text.en: Henceforth, I shall perfectly restrain myself.
text.en-trans: chinché yangdakpar lekpar dammo

text.en: Even at the cost of my own life, I will not commit such acts again.
text.en-trans: sok la bab kyang mi gyi do

text.en: Noble ones endowed with great compassion, please accept these remorseful confessions of mine, and grant the great absolution that purifies potential obscurations.
text.en-trans: pakpa tukjé chenpo dang denpa khyé nam kyi dak gi gyö tsang gi shakpa di yangdakpar zhé né dribpar migyurwé dak tsang chenpo tsal du sol

text.en: In your great love, forgive me, I pray.
text.en-trans: tsewa chenpö zöpar dzé du sol

text.en: As represented by the sources of virtue that I accumulate throughout the three times,
text.en-trans: dak gi dü sum du sakpé gewé tsawa di tsön té

text.en: I gather together and combine all the virtuous actions of ordinary beings, noble śrāvakas, pratyekabuddhas, bodhisattvas on the paths of training, those on the stages of great irreversibility, as well as noble buddhas at the stage of no-more-training and nirvāṇa, from the first moment that they set their minds upon awakening
text.en-trans: sosö kyewo dang pakpa nyentö dang rang sangyé dang changchub sempa lam la lobpa dang chirmidokpa chenpö sa la nepa nam dang pakpa mi lobpa nya ngen lé depé sa la zhukpé sangye nam kyi dangpo changchub tu tuk kyepa né zung

text.en: Until they finally attain complete and perfect enlightenment,
text.en-trans: tar gyi ngönpar dzok sang ma gyé kyi bar gyi

text.en: Both surpassable tainted and untainted virtues,
text.en-trans: zakché zakmé kyi gewé tsok lana yöpa dang

text.en: As well as the unsurpassable, all combined,
text.en-trans: lana machipé gé tsok tamché chik tu dü shing dum té

text.en: Presenting it as the great offering clouds of Samantabhadra to all you guardians and great compassionate ones.
text.en-trans: gönpo tukjé chenpo dang denpa khyé nam kyi chen ngar kunzang chöpé trinpung chenpor bulwar gyi’o

text.en: Through this offering, may all that is envisioned by the noble root and lineage gurus and all the buddhas and bodhisattvas who dwell throughout the ten directions all come to pass entirely and without hindrance.
text.en-trans: detar pulwa la ten né tsa gyü kyi lama dampa chok chur shek shing zhukpé sangye changchub sempa chenpo tamché kyi jitar tuk la gongpé dön tamché gekmé yongsu drubpar gyur chik

text.en: Unleash the power of the great truth and compassion1
text.en-trans: chok chu dü zhi gyalwa sé ché dang

text.en: Of the victorious buddhas and their bodhisattva heirs throughout the ten directions and four times,
text.en-trans: khyepar lama orgyen pema jung

text.en: And especially the Oḍḍiyāna Guru Padmasambhava,
text.en-trans: arya taré dorjé zhönnu yi

text.en: Ārya Tārā and Vajrakumāra.
text.en-trans: tukjé denpa chenpö tsal chung la

text.en: As the fierce flames of the five poisonous mental afflictions
text.en-trans: dak gi shé gyü sekpar jepa yi

text.en: Burn and blaze within my mind,
text.en-trans: nyönmong duk ngé mewal drakpo dang

text.en: And I am beset by desire and craving in particular,
text.en-trans: khyepar dö sé kampé dungwa yi

text.en: I must circle again and again, tormented, in conditioned existence.
text.en-trans: lar yang sipar yang yang khor zhing nar

text.en: If I continue to succumb like this in future,
text.en-trans: dadung dindré wang du dak gyur na

text.en: I will surely experience the intense misery of the lower realms.
text.en-trans: ngensong dukngal drakpo nyongwar ngé

text.en: Therefore, all you guardians in your compassion,
text.en-trans: dena gönpo khyé nam tukjé yi

text.en: Let all my negative thoughts based on dysfunctional tendencies
text.en-trans: né ngen len gyi namtok ngenpa nam

text.en: Be swiftly and surely eradicated, I pray.
text.en-trans: nyurwa nyi du zhompar dzé du sol

text.en: Grant your blessings so that they may never recur.
text.en-trans: chinché lar mi kyewar jingyi lob

text.en: Cause my mind to turn toward the Dharma, the Dharma to progress along the path,
text.en-trans: lona chö dro damchö lam du long

text.en: The path to pacify delusion and delusion to dawn as wisdom.
text.en-trans: lam gyi trul zhi trulpa yeshe su

text.en: Gurus and yidam deities, guard me with your compassion.
text.en-trans: charwar lama yidam tukjé kyob

text.en: Quench the fires of worldly existence, I pray.
text.en-trans: sipé mé tsok zhiwar dzé du sol

text.en: Cause my wishes and actions that accord with the Dharma to succeed,
text.en-trans: chö tün samjor yizhin drubpa dang

text.en: And pacify all obstacles on the path to awakening.
text.en-trans: changchub lam gyi barché zhiwar dzö

text.en: Kyema Kyihü!O compassionate protectors,
text.en-trans: kyema kyi hü gönpo tukjé chen

text.en: Look kindly upon me, an evildoer, I pray.
text.en-trans: lé ngen dak la chen gyi zik su sol

text.en: Do not permit me to fall prey to negative deeds,
text.en-trans: zik né lé ngen wang du mi tongwar

text.en: But inspire me with your blessings so that I may swiftly develop
text.en-trans: yangdak ta dang tokpa khyepar chen

text.en: The genuine view and extraordinary realization.
text.en-trans: nyurdu gyü la kyewar jingyi lob

text.en: As soon as I depart this life, may I be reborn
text.en-trans: di né tsé pö nyi du deden zhing

text.en: In the blissful realm, in the presence of the supreme guide Lord Amitābha,
text.en-trans: dren chok öpakmé gön zhab drung du

text.en: And receive a prophecy of my future awakening.
text.en-trans: kyé né changchub lungten tobpar shok

text.en: May all those connected to me, even those who merely hear my name,
text.en-trans: dak la drel dang ming tsam töpa nam

text.en: Never experience the sufferings of the lower realms,
text.en-trans: ngensong dukngal tadak mi nyong zhing

text.en: But take birth in the supreme realm of Sukhāvatī.
text.en-trans: zhing chok dewachen du kyewar shok

text.en: In short, in everything that I do
text.en-trans: dorna dak gi jawa chi gyipa

text.en: May I never consider my own self-interest even in my dreams,
text.en-trans: rangdön milam tsam du ang mi sem zhing

text.en: But always act purely to bring benefit to others.
text.en-trans: zhen la penpa khonar gyurwa la

text.en: In this, may the protector Mañjughoṣa, Samantabhadra and others
text.en-trans: gönpo jamyang kuntuzang sok kyi

text.en: Ensure that all this comes to pass, exactly in accordance with my aspirations.
text.en-trans: jitar mönpa zhindu drub gyur chik
